title: :last-of-type
description: The `:last-of-type` CSS pseudo-class selects the last element of its type among siblings of the same parent element.
content:
The pseudo-class that applies styles to the last element of a specific type within its parent. Itâ€™s similar to `:last-child`, but it only matches elements of the same type (like the last `

` in a series of paragraphs), making it useful for styling specific types of content in a group.
